Further details of distribution rights and copyright ownership  are available at www.digimediaapps.com/license.aspx*******   Features include    ********** - For all screen sizes - Tap to page up/down, flick to fast scroll or drag for slow scroll - Opens up where you left off reading - Variable font size - Choice of background color including white text on black background - Portrait and Landscape mode - Table of Contents for easy navigation between chapters - Set bookmarks to remember marked sections
